dimensions: Overall: 24.7 x 12.6 cm diameter (9 3/4 x 4 15/16 in. diam)
title: Scent bottle
description: White glass scent bottle with an undulating form and very decorative lid with pointed knob. Lower section of bottle has a floral pattern around the bottom. Very bottom of bottle has repeating clear circles outlined in gold, which is repeated on the top and lid of the bottle. Part of a set.
name: Scent bottle
